code: import React from'react';import'./CSS/Loginsignup.css';import{useState}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useUser}from'../Context/UserContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Loginsignup=props=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login}=useUser();const navigate=useNavigate();const logInUser=()=>{const adminCredentials={email:"admin@admin.com",password:"admin",profile:{name:"Admin",email:"admin@admin.com"}};const guestCredentials={email:"guest@gmail.com",password:"123456",profile:{name:"Guest",email:"guest@gmail.com",username:"Guest123"}};if(email===adminCredentials.email&&password===adminCredentials.password){login('admin',adminCredentials.profile);navigate('/admin');}else if(email===guestCredentials.email&&password===guestCredentials.password){login('guest',guestCredentials.profile);navigate('/guest');}else{alert('Login failed: Incorrect email or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Email",value:email,name:"email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"textbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,name:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"remember-me",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"remember",name:"remember"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Remember Me"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn",onClick:logInUser,children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signuplink",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"New Customer?"})})]});};export default Loginsignup;
